title: (Half) Realistic Family Movie
review:
I understand how an east asian woman would get the feels and tinging down there for a strong developed American man. But the man she chose is a divorced loser with a child and ex-wife who is not even ex.
I mean let's keep it realistic.
On the other hand he was tapping not anything serious of course.

title: A divorced deadbeat loser attracts three Asian Women
review:
I guess the director is making a five dolla sucky sucky reference. What do these women see in this deadbeat no-good to follow him across the pond?
bad script, bad acting, silly conclusion.
At least the daughter/niece has a little bit of something for men to be interested.

title: A Fun (Japanese) Family Film
review:
Is that FFF?

Well it is FJFF... It is funny, curious and offers scenes from both Japan and California. Good actresses.
